thread.section_title: VIP Communications Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VIP Communications | joinvip.com
thread.title: Martha Berriman
thread.title_full: VIP Communications reviewed by Martha Berriman

author: Martha Berriman
title: Martha Berriman
text: I use Vip communications...it has clear lines and great customer service. I gave only four stars because sometimes it takes your money without you being connected to the person you are calling. The reason could be the weather or no internet service but still you would be charged because you have tried to call. Overal I trust the Vip cominicatiins and suggested to anyone who needs to make a long distance call.
